content:
(The scene opens with the whole gang sitting at their usual table at Patty's Pub, drinking their beers and joking around. Suddenly, Dennis and Mac get into an argument.)

Dennis: "I'm telling you, JFK was assassinated. It's a proven fact."

Mac: "No way, man. He died of natural causes. Heart attack or something."

Dennis: "What are you talking about? The Warren Commission clearly said it was a lone gunman."

Mac: "I don't care what some commission said. I've done my own research and I know the truth."

Charlie: "What are you guys even talking about?"

Dennis: "Mac here thinks JFK died of natural causes."

Charlie: "Yeah, that's ridiculous. Everyone knows he was killed by the government."

(Everyone looks at Charlie in surprise)

Dennis: "See, even Charlie knows it was an assassination."

Mac: "I'm telling you, there's more to the story. And I have the evidence to prove it."

(Mac pulls out a stack of conspiracy theory books and begins to read from one)

Dennis: "Oh please, you're just reading from some crackpot's website."

Mac: "This is from the Smithsonian, you moron!"

(The argument escalates with the gang getting increasingly confused and frustrated)

Charlie: "Wait a minute, JFK died in the 60s, right? So why does it even matter now?"

Dennis: "Exactly! It doesn't matter, let's just drop it."

Mac: "I'll drop it when the truth is finally told!"

(The scene ends with Mac storming out of the pub, while the rest of the gang just shakes their heads and continues drinking)
